paragraphs.text: Later, when Zuko was traveling alone through the plains village, he met a young boy, Lee, to whom he gave the pearl dagger upon his departure. The dagger was stolen, however, by Gow, after Lee pulled the knife on him when he and his corrupt soldiers came to the farm, asking for food. After Zuko defeated Gow with his firebending, he reclaimed the dagger and attempted to return it to Lee, but the disappointed boy angrily refused to accept it.
